nodes.text: Rhirren was a Wookiee of the Myyydril tribe that lived in the Myyydril Caverns on Kashyyyk. He worked as a guard, protecting his village from threats like the Urnsor'is.

Rhirren appeared as a non-player character in the video game Star Wars Galaxies, a massively multiplayer online-role playing game developed by Sony Online Entertainment and published by LucasArts, prior to its closure on December 15, 2011.
